pageContext.description: Butt chipped: edge chipped & one corner missing
pageContext.patina: bright green, pale green in pit holes
pageContext.surface: badly pitted . Some rust adheres to one side. the other partly covered with yellow clay.
pageContext.other: Length, width, thickness not recorded in any units. Have assumed inches & recorded accordingly
pageContext.associations: part of a hoard of 60 pieces. including (Evans, A. B. Imps., p 169) [...], [...] gouges, socketed & tanged knives, swords, seatband [...] spearheads, & flat, conical & angular pieces [...]
pageContext.publications: Proc. Soc. Ant. (2nd [...]) VII 480, V. C. H. B[...]ks i, 182-3 Evans. Anc. B. Imps. p. 169 (not in chapter on Flat [...])
pageContext.collection: Private Collection 1923, P. Waterhouse Esq. Yattendon Court
pageContext.site: England,  berkshire, yattendon, yattendon court, in digging foundations of house, 1878
